languages.text: "Заранее простите меня, если я нарушу какой-то протокол подобающего общения со столь значимой персоной, как ваша. Думаю, легкое волнение допустимо для тех, кого Лорд-капитан принимает в своем кабинете лично".

traits.locale_text: "Заранее простите меня, если я нарушу какой-то протокол подобающего общения со столь значимой персоной, как ваша. Думаю, легкое волнение допустимо для тех, кого вы принимаете в своем личном кабинете".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Apologies in advance if I unknowingly violate the protocol for conversing with someone of your elevated status. I think a slip in composure is to be expected when one is hosted personally in the Lord Captain's study."
languages.original_text: "Заранее простите меня, если я нарушу какой-то протокол подобающего общения со столь значимой персоной, как ваша. Думаю, легкое волнение допустимо для тех, кого Лорд-капитан принимает в своем кабинете лично".

traits.locale_text: "Apologies in advance if I unknowingly violate the protocol for conversing with someone of your elevated status. I think a slip in composure is to be expected when one is hosted personally in the Lord Captain's study."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Apologies in advance if I unknowingly violate the protocol for conversing with someone of your elevated status. I think a slip in composure is to be expected when one is hosted personally in the Lord Captain's study."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Apologies in advance if I unknowingly violate the protocol for conversing with someone of your elevated status. I think a slip in composure is to be expected when one is hosted personally in the Lord Captain's study."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Apologies in advance if I unknowingly violate the protocol for conversing with someone of your elevated status. I think a slip in composure is to be expected when one is hosted personally in the Lord Captain's study."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “请允许我提前向你道歉。与你这样尊贵的人这样交谈，我可能会在意识不到的情况下有悖礼数。领主舰长亲自在书房里接待，我可能难免会一时不知所措。”
languages.original_text: "Apologies in advance if I unknowingly violate the protocol for conversing with someone of your elevated status. I think a slip in composure is to be expected when one is hosted personally in the Lord Captain's study."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我提前向你道歉。与你这样尊贵的人这样交谈，我可能会在意识不到的情况下有悖礼数。领主舰长亲自在书房里接待，我可能难免会一时不知所措。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Permítame que me disculpe por adelantado por si rompo alguna regla protocolaria al hablar con alguien de su estatus. Creo que una pérdida de compostura es algo previsible cuando uno recibe una audiencia personal en el estudio de un Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Apologies in advance if I unknowingly violate the protocol for conversing with someone of your elevated status. I think a slip in composure is to be expected when one is hosted personally in the Lord Captain's study."

traits.locale_text: «Permítame que me disculpe por adelantado por si rompo alguna regla protocolaria al hablar con alguien de su estatus. Creo que una pérdida de compostura es algo previsible cuando uno recibe una audiencia personal en el estudio de un Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたのような気高き地位の方と会話する際のプロトコルに、私が知らず知らずのうちに違反していたのなら、あらかじめお詫びしておこう。ロード・キャプテンの書斎で個人的に接待を受ける場合、落ち着きを欠いてしまうことは当然ではないだろうか」
languages.original_text: "Apologies in advance if I unknowingly violate the protocol for conversing with someone of your elevated status. I think a slip in composure is to be expected when one is hosted personally in the Lord Captain's study."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのような気高き地位の方と会話する際のプロトコルに、私が知らず知らずのうちに違反していたのなら、あらかじめお詫びしておこう。ロード・キャプテンの書斎で個人的に接待を受ける場合、落ち着きを欠いてしまうことは当然ではないだろうか」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi si j'enfreins par mégarde le protocole régissant les conversations avec quelqu'un de votre statut. J'imagine qu'il est normal de perdre son sang-froid quand on est reçu dans le bureau {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Apologies in advance if I unknowingly violate the protocol for conversing with someone of your elevated status. I think a slip in composure is to be expected when one is hosted personally in the Lord Captain's study."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi si j'enfreins par mégarde le protocole régissant les conversations avec quelqu'un de votre statut. J'imagine qu'il est normal de perdre son sang-froid quand on est reçu dans le bureau {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich entschuldige mich im Voraus, sollte ich das Protokoll für eine Unterhaltung mit jemandem Eures hohen Status unwissentlich nicht eingehalten haben. Man sollte einem zugestehen, ganz kurz die Fassung zu verlieren, wenn man im Arbeitszimmer des Lord Captains persönlich empfangen wird."
languages.original_text: "Apologies in advance if I unknowingly violate the protocol for conversing with someone of your elevated status. I think a slip in composure is to be expected when one is hosted personally in the Lord Captain's study."

traits.locale_text: "Ich entschuldige mich im Voraus, sollte ich das Protokoll für eine Unterhaltung mit jemandem Eures hohen Status unwissentlich nicht eingehalten haben. Man sollte einem zugestehen, ganz kurz die Fassung zu verlieren, wenn man im Arbeitszimmer des Lord Captains persönlich empfangen wird."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Apologies in advance if I unknowingly violate the protocol for conversing with someone of your elevated status. I think a slip in composure is to be expected when one is hosted personally in the Lord Captain's study."

languages.text: "Böylesine yüksek statüdeki biriyle sohbet protokollerini istem dışı ihlal etmeme karşı önceden özürlerimi sunuyorum. Lord Kaptan'ın çalışma odasında bizzat ağırlanan birinin soğukkanlılığını bir nebze de olsa kaybetmesinin beklenebileceği görüşündeyim."
languages.original_text: "Apologies in advance if I unknowingly violate the protocol for conversing with someone of your elevated status. I think a slip in composure is to be expected when one is hosted personally in the Lord Captain's study."
